name: gamess-ri-mp2-miniapp
description:
The GAMESS RI-MP2 mini-app computes the correlation energy with the
Hartree-Fock energy and wave-function given as inputs. The inputs were
generated from GAMESS.

dependencies.name: mpi
dependencies.description:
The HPC-X MPI implementation from NVIDIA/Mellanox based on OpenMPI. This
package is for external specs only.

dependencies.name: lapack
dependencies.description:
Arm Performance Libraries provides optimized standard core math
libraries for high-performance computing applications on Arm processors.
